Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
